laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment with oral steroids, proteinuria improved to 0.6 g/gCr.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Light microscopy revealed 19 glomeruli; 5 exhibited global glomerulosclerosis, 1 was a crescentic glomerulus. Two-thirds of the glomeruli had mesangial proliferation and subendothelial deposits.
